entry.content:
Season 10 is here but if you do not have v-bucks then you surely won’t be happy! However, we will help you so don’t you worry.

 

 

Is this legit?

We know there are a lot of fake sites claiming they are giving away V-Bucks but they don't! However, that's not the case on Trustle. 

How To Enter?

It's very easy to enter and have a chance to get a large amount of v-bucks! The most easiest way is to just visit this link. Great! All left is to follow the instructions on the stated website. Cheers! 

We hope you enjoy your Season 10 in Fortnite and win them all so that you can buy new skins, wraps & emotes. Best of luck! 

What's More?

We are super excited, we will be bringing-in more giveaways, stay tune and bookmark this site. Have a good day.

entry.title: Take Surveys, Earn Cash or Gift Cards
entry.summary: I love finding unique ways to save money or hacks to earn free money and gift cards. So it is no surprise that Survey Junkie caught my attention… Survey JunkieSurvey Junkie is a website where users to take surveys in exchange for points that can be redeemed…
entry.content:
I love finding unique ways to save money or hacks to earn free money and gift cards. So it is no surprise that Survey Junkie caught my attention…

What is Survey Junkie?

Survey JunkieSurvey Junkie is a website where users to take surveys in exchange for points that can be redeemed for gift cards or a deposit into your account. Signing up for the website is quick and painless; you can use your plus account, or your email to log in.

Is it a scam?

Most in-game surveys I found were thinly veiled spam to sell a product or capture personal information. Frankly, the amount of spam has turned me off to most surveys sites or gift card offers.

Survey Junkie passes on the “legitimate test,” both my wife and I used the website for over an hour, completing multiple surveys. Neither my wife nor I were directed to any shady surveys, nor were we asked to divulge any personal or sensitive information.

Results

Moreover, if you have few hours a day to complete the surveys, they could be worth three thousand to four thousand a year in retirement savings.

If you are looking for a way to make a few extra dollars, give Survey Junkie a try and let me know how it goes, should you decided to try Survey Junkie, please consider using my affiliate link here.  It helps keep the site running.
